name: Paperless Receipt Library
summary: Learn about .RWLIBRARY files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Paperless can sort the receipt images by date and other metadata. The program also uses Mariner's optical character recognition (OCR) technology to identify receipt text such as the price, payment method, and merchant. Users can then sort and search receipts using this information in the software. Paperless also stores digital document libraries in .DWLIBRARY files.
NOTE: Mariner Software no longer develops Paperless.

description: Digital receipt collection created by Paperless, a program used to organize electronic copies of receipts and other documents; stores scanned images of paper receipts, as well as the transaction information; used for archiving personal financial records.
